categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: The 104th Battalion was a mobile armored unit in the Grand Army of the Republic that was led by Jedi Master Plo Koon and Clone Commander CC-3636 "Wolffe", during the Clone Wars. It included the Wolfpack, a squad named after their commander.
The 104th Battalion utilized AT-RT, AT-TE walkers, TX-130 Saber-class fighter tanks, HAVw A6 Juggernauts and LAAT/i gunships.
